howItWorks.title: How to generate 8 times table worksheets

step1.title: 1. Design
step1.body: Pick your times table. how many questions you want and choose your layout.

step2.title: 2. Create
step2.body: Click create and we’ll generate your worksheet in seconds! Sign up for free to download.

step3.title: 3. Print & Share
step3.body: Now it’s all yours to download, print, and share with your students.

worksheetPreview.title: 16 Times table chart
worksheetPreview.body: The 16 times table is about multiplying 16 by other integers. All products in the 16 x table are even numbers. Understanding the 16x table is fundamental for building a strong understanding of multiplication and improving mental arithmetic. Mastery of the 16x table boosts confidence and sparks interest in learning more complex math concepts. An interesting fact: 16 is a square number (4 x 4 = 16), showing how different math topics are connected and making learning more interesting for students. See the sixteen times table below.

explainerCards.title: Making teaching simple
explainerCards.body: AstroSafe makes the job of organising and creating lessons quick and simple. So teachers can spend more time teaching and less time on prep.

cards.title: Teachers
cards.text: For teachers looking for a quick and easy way to prepare curriculum aligned lessons, AstroSafe makes creating a worksheet as simple as clicking a button.

cards.title: Tutors
cards.text: Tutors can easily curate worksheets to appropriate level for each of their students. Personalised worksheet creation has never been simpler and quicker.

cards.title: Parents
cards.text: AstroSafe makes it simple to support your child at home by allowing parents to make classroom-grade worksheets at a click of a button.

cards.question: Is the AstroSafe Worksheet Generator free to use?
cards.answer: The worksheet generator is free for 30 days with no credit card details needed. After the trial period ends you will be prompted to upgrade to our paid product. Alternatively you can continue on the Lite plan which still provides full access but limits usage.

cards.question: Can I create different worksheets?
cards.answer: Of course - we have a bunch of tools to create different worksheets all across the math curriculum. Create a free account and check out the dashboard to see what you can create! If you want worksheets we don’t currently offer - just email hello@astrosafe.co and let us know!

cards.question: Do you offer school discounts?
cards.answer: Yes we do! If you’re interested in creating an account for all of the teachers in your school please contact hello@astrosafe.co and we can create a plan that works for you!
